DBLP:conf/icwsm/GuoML23.title: A Data Fusion Framework for Multi-Domain Morality Learning
DBLP:conf/icwsm/GuoML23.author:
Siyi Guo and
Negar Mokhberian and
Kristina Lerman
DBLP:conf/icwsm/GuoML23.paperMotivationText: Datasets for morality inference vary in terms of data collection method, domain, topics, annotation instructions, etc. Simply aggreggating such heterogeneous datasets during training can yield models that fail to generalize well.
DBLP:conf/icwsm/GuoML23.paperContributionText: The authors propose a framework for training on multiple heterogeneous datasets that improves performances and generalizability.
DBLP:conf/icwsm/GuoML23.paperResultsText: The proposed framework achieves SOTA performance in different morality inference datasets.
DBLP:conf/icwsm/GuoML23.resourcesOtherText: Covid tweets (Rojecki et al. 2021), Congress tweets (Johnson and Goldwasser 2018)
DBLP:conf/icwsm/GuoML23.semiMLText: Domain adaptation on unlabelled data for one component of the architecture
